statements.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION ( `SID` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , `AXTMODIFY` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTTITLE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `RESELLERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTATIONNO_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTE_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPACT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIP_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `EMAIL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PHONE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `FAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ORDERTYPE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `DELIVERYADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `OFFERORS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_NAME1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SPECIFICATION1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARVALUE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARVALUE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_NAME2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SPECIFICATION2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARVALUE2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_PRICE2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARVALUE2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_PRICE2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_NAME3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SPECIFICATION3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARVALUE3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_PRICE3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARVALUE3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_PRICE3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_NAME4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SPECIFICATION4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_VALUE4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_PRICE4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_VALUE4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_PRICE4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTALVALUEYEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOTE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `HEAD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SALES_MANAGER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ATTN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`SID`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATIONHISTORY ( `SID` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , `AXTMODIFY` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTTITLE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `RESELLERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTATIONNO_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTE_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPACT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIP_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `EMAIL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PHONE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `FAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ORDERTYPE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `DELIVERYADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `OFFERORS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_NAME1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SPECIFICATION1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARVALUE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARVALUE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_NAME2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SPECIFICATION2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARVALUE2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_PRICE2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARVALUE2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_PRICE2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_NAME3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SPECIFICATION3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARVALUE3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_PRICE3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARVALUE3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_PRICE3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_NAME4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SPECIFICATION4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_VALUE4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_PRICE4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_VALUE4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_PRICE4_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTALVALUEYEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOTE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `HEAD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SALES_MANAGER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ATTN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MODIFYUSER` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ACTION` VARCHAR(200) NULL, `UPDATETIME` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

INSERT RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATIONHISTORY SELECT SID , AXTMODIFY , REPORTTITLE_V , REPORTNAME_V , RESELLERNAME_V , QUOTATIONNO_V , UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V , QUOTE_DATE_V , COMPACT_V , SHIP_DATE_V , EMAIL_V , PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V , PHONE_V , COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V , FAX_V , CUSTOMERNAME_V , ADDRESS_V , ORDERTYPE_V , DELIVERYADDRESS_V , OFFERORS_V , ITEM1_V , PRODUCT_NAME1_V , SPECIFICATION1_V , QUANTITY1_V , ONEYEARVALUE1_V , ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V , THREEYEARVALUE1_V , THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V , ITEM2_V , PRODUCT_NAME2_V , SPECIFICATION2_V , QUANTITY2_V , ONEYEARVALUE2_V , ONE_YEAR_PRICE2_V , THREEYEARVALUE2_V , THREE_YEAR_PRICE2_V , ITEM3_V , PRODUCT_NAME3_V , SPECIFICATION3_V , QUANTITY3_V , ONEYEARVALUE3_V , ONE_YEAR_PRICE3_V , THREEYEARVALUE3_V , THREE_YEAR_PRICE3_V , ITEM4_V , PRODUCT_NAME4_V , SPECIFICATION4_V , QUANTITY4_V , ONE_YEAR_VALUE4_V , ONE_YEAR_PRICE4_V , THREE_YEAR_VALUE4_V , THREE_YEAR_PRICE4_V , NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V , NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V , NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V , NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V , ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V , ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V , THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V , THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V , TOTALVALUEYEAR_V , TOTAL_YEAR_V , TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V , TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V , NOTE_V , HEAD_V , SALES_MANAGER_V , ATTN_V , CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V, '$USERID$', 'UPDATE', NOW() FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION WHERE SID = #SID#

INSERT RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATIONHISTORY SELECT SID , AXTMODIFY , REPORTTITLE_V , REPORTNAME_V , RESELLERNAME_V , QUOTATIONNO_V , UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V , QUOTE_DATE_V , COMPACT_V , SHIP_DATE_V , EMAIL_V , PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V , PHONE_V , COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V , FAX_V , CUSTOMERNAME_V , ADDRESS_V , ORDERTYPE_V , DELIVERYADDRESS_V , OFFERORS_V , ITEM1_V , PRODUCT_NAME1_V , SPECIFICATION1_V , QUANTITY1_V , ONEYEARVALUE1_V , ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V , THREEYEARVALUE1_V , THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V , ITEM2_V , PRODUCT_NAME2_V , SPECIFICATION2_V , QUANTITY2_V , ONEYEARVALUE2_V , ONE_YEAR_PRICE2_V , THREEYEARVALUE2_V , THREE_YEAR_PRICE2_V , ITEM3_V , PRODUCT_NAME3_V , SPECIFICATION3_V , QUANTITY3_V , ONEYEARVALUE3_V , ONE_YEAR_PRICE3_V , THREEYEARVALUE3_V , THREE_YEAR_PRICE3_V , ITEM4_V , PRODUCT_NAME4_V , SPECIFICATION4_V , QUANTITY4_V , ONE_YEAR_VALUE4_V , ONE_YEAR_PRICE4_V , THREE_YEAR_VALUE4_V , THREE_YEAR_PRICE4_V , NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V , NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V , NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V , NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V , ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V , ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V , THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V , THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V , TOTALVALUEYEAR_V , TOTAL_YEAR_V , TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V , TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V , NOTE_V , HEAD_V , SALES_MANAGER_V , ATTN_V , CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V, '$USERID$', 'DELETE', NOW() FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION WHERE SID = #SID#
statements.select: Select * From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION LIMIT #START_V# , #LIMIT_V#
statements.statement: Select DEALER_TW_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_DATA WHERE DEALER_TW_V != '' ORDER BY DEALER_TW_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(DEALER_TW_V) AS DEALER_TW_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_DATA WHERE DEALER_TW_V != '' ORDER BY DEALER_TW_V
statements.statement: Select QUOTATIONNO_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE QUOTATIONNO_V != '' ORDER BY QUOTATIONNO_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(QUOTATIONNO_V) AS QUOTATIONNO_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE QUOTATIONNO_V != '' ORDER BY QUOTATIONNO_V
statements.statement: Select PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V != '' ORDER BY PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V) AS PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V != '' ORDER BY PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V
statements.statement: Select COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V != '' ORDER BY COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V) AS COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V != '' ORDER BY COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V
statements.statement: Select CUSTOMERNAME_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE CUSTOMERNAME_V != '' ORDER BY CUSTOMERNAME_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(CUSTOMERNAME_V) AS CUSTOMERNAME_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE CUSTOMERNAME_V != '' ORDER BY CUSTOMERNAME_V
statements.statement: Select ORDERTYPE_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE ORDERTYPE_V != '' ORDER BY ORDERTYPE_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(ORDERTYPE_V) AS ORDERTYPE_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE ORDERTYPE_V != '' ORDER BY ORDERTYPE_V
statements.statement: Select OFFERORS_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE OFFERORS_V != '' ORDER BY OFFERORS_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(OFFERORS_V) AS OFFERORS_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE OFFERORS_V != '' ORDER BY OFFERORS_V
statements.statement: Select ITEM1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE ITEM1_V != '' ORDER BY ITEM1_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(ITEM1_V) AS ITEM1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE ITEM1_V != '' ORDER BY ITEM1_V
statements.statement: Select PRODUCT_NAME1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME1_V != '' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NAME1_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(PRODUCT_NAME1_V) AS PRODUCT_NAME1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME1_V != '' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NAME1_V
statements.statement: Select SPECIFICATION1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE SPECIFICATION1_V != '' ORDER BY SPECIFICATION1_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(SPECIFICATION1_V) AS SPECIFICATION1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE SPECIFICATION1_V != '' ORDER BY SPECIFICATION1_V
statements.statement: Select QUANTITY1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE QUANTITY1_V != '' ORDER BY QUANTITY1_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(QUANTITY1_V) AS QUANTITY1_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE QUANTITY1_V != '' ORDER BY QUANTITY1_V
statements.statement: Select ITEM2_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE ITEM2_V != '' ORDER BY ITEM2_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(ITEM2_V) AS ITEM2_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE ITEM2_V != '' ORDER BY ITEM2_V
statements.statement: Select PRODUCT_NAME2_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME2_V != '' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NAME2_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(PRODUCT_NAME2_V) AS PRODUCT_NAME2_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME2_V != '' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NAME2_V
statements.statement: Select SPECIFICATION2_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE SPECIFICATION2_V != '' ORDER BY SPECIFICATION2_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(SPECIFICATION2_V) AS SPECIFICATION2_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE SPECIFICATION2_V != '' ORDER BY SPECIFICATION2_V
statements.statement: Select QUANTITY2_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE QUANTITY2_V != '' ORDER BY QUANTITY2_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(QUANTITY2_V) AS QUANTITY2_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE QUANTITY2_V != '' ORDER BY QUANTITY2_V
statements.statement: Select ITEM3_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE ITEM3_V != '' ORDER BY ITEM3_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(ITEM3_V) AS ITEM3_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE ITEM3_V != '' ORDER BY ITEM3_V
statements.statement: Select PRODUCT_NAME3_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME3_V != '' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NAME3_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(PRODUCT_NAME3_V) AS PRODUCT_NAME3_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME3_V != '' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NAME3_V
statements.statement: Select SPECIFICATION3_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE SPECIFICATION3_V != '' ORDER BY SPECIFICATION3_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(SPECIFICATION3_V) AS SPECIFICATION3_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE SPECIFICATION3_V != '' ORDER BY SPECIFICATION3_V
statements.statement: Select QUANTITY3_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE QUANTITY3_V != '' ORDER BY QUANTITY3_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(QUANTITY3_V) AS QUANTITY3_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE QUANTITY3_V != '' ORDER BY QUANTITY3_V
statements.statement: Select ITEM4_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE ITEM4_V != '' ORDER BY ITEM4_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(ITEM4_V) AS ITEM4_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE ITEM4_V != '' ORDER BY ITEM4_V
statements.statement: Select PRODUCT_NAME4_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME4_V != '' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NAME4_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(PRODUCT_NAME4_V) AS PRODUCT_NAME4_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE PRODUCT_NAME4_V != '' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NAME4_V
statements.statement: Select SPECIFICATION4_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE SPECIFICATION4_V != '' ORDER BY SPECIFICATION4_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(SPECIFICATION4_V) AS SPECIFICATION4_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE SPECIFICATION4_V != '' ORDER BY SPECIFICATION4_V
statements.statement: Select QUANTITY4_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE QUANTITY4_V != '' ORDER BY QUANTITY4_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(QUANTITY4_V) AS QUANTITY4_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE QUANTITY4_V != '' ORDER BY QUANTITY4_V
statements.statement: Select HEAD_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE HEAD_V != '' ORDER BY HEAD_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(HEAD_V) AS HEAD_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE HEAD_V != '' ORDER BY HEAD_V
statements.statement: Select SALES_MANAGER_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE SALES_MANAGER_V != '' ORDER BY SALES_MANAGER_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(SALES_MANAGER_V) AS SALES_MANAGER_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE SALES_MANAGER_V != '' ORDER BY SALES_MANAGER_V
statements.statement: Select ATTN_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE ATTN_V != '' ORDER BY ATTN_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(ATTN_V) AS ATTN_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION_INPUT WHERE ATTN_V != '' ORDER BY ATTN_V
statements.insert: INSERT INTO RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION(SID, AXTMODIFY, REPORTTITLE_V, REPORTNAME_V, RESELLERNAME_V, QUOTATIONNO_V, UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V, QUOTE_DATE_V, COMPACT_V, SHIP_DATE_V, EMAIL_V, PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V, PHONE_V, COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V, FAX_V, CUSTOMERNAME_V, ADDRESS_V, ORDERTYPE_V, DELIVERYADDRESS_V, OFFERORS_V, ITEM1_V, PRODUCT_NAME1_V, SPECIFICATION1_V, QUANTITY1_V, ONEYEARVALUE1_V, ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V, THREEYEARVALUE1_V, THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V, ITEM2_V, PRODUCT_NAME2_V, SPECIFICATION2_V, QUANTITY2_V, ONEYEARVALUE2_V, ONE_YEAR_PRICE2_V, THREEYEARVALUE2_V, THREE_YEAR_PRICE2_V, ITEM3_V, PRODUCT_NAME3_V, SPECIFICATION3_V, QUANTITY3_V, ONEYEARVALUE3_V, ONE_YEAR_PRICE3_V, THREEYEARVALUE3_V, THREE_YEAR_PRICE3_V, ITEM4_V, PRODUCT_NAME4_V, SPECIFICATION4_V, QUANTITY4_V, ONE_YEAR_VALUE4_V, ONE_YEAR_PRICE4_V, THREE_YEAR_VALUE4_V, THREE_YEAR_PRICE4_V, NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V, NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V, NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V, NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V, ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V, ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V, THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V, THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V, TOTALVALUEYEAR_V, TOTAL_YEAR_V, TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V, TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V, NOTE_V, HEAD_V, SALES_MANAGER_V, ATTN_V, CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V) VALUES(#SID#, #AXTMODIFY#, #REPORTTITLE_V#, #REPORTNAME_V#, #RESELLERNAME_V#, #QUOTATIONNO_V#, #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#, #QUOTE_DATE_V#, #COMPACT_V#, #SHIP_DATE_V#, #EMAIL_V#, #PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V#, #PHONE_V#, #COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V#, #FAX_V#, #CUSTOMERNAME_V#, #ADDRESS_V#, #ORDERTYPE_V#, #DELIVERYADDRESS_V#, #OFFERORS_V#, #ITEM1_V#, #PRODUCT_NAME1_V#, #SPECIFICATION1_V#, #QUANTITY1_V#, #ONEYEARVALUE1_V#, #ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V#, #THREEYEARVALUE1_V#, #THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V#, #ITEM2_V#, #PRODUCT_NAME2_V#, #SPECIFICATION2_V#, #QUANTITY2_V#, #ONEYEARVALUE2_V#, #ONE_YEAR_PRICE2_V#, #THREEYEARVALUE2_V#, #THREE_YEAR_PRICE2_V#, #ITEM3_V#, #PRODUCT_NAME3_V#, #SPECIFICATION3_V#, #QUANTITY3_V#, #ONEYEARVALUE3_V#, #ONE_YEAR_PRICE3_V#, #THREEYEARVALUE3_V#, #THREE_YEAR_PRICE3_V#, #ITEM4_V#, #PRODUCT_NAME4_V#, #SPECIFICATION4_V#, #QUANTITY4_V#, #ONE_YEAR_VALUE4_V#, #ONE_YEAR_PRICE4_V#, #THREE_YEAR_VALUE4_V#, #THREE_YEAR_PRICE4_V#, #NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V#, #NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V#, #NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V#, #NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V#, #ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V#, #ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V#, #THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V#, #THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V#, #TOTALVALUEYEAR_V#, #TOTAL_YEAR_V#, #TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V#, #TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V#, #NOTE_V#, #HEAD_V#, #SALES_MANAGER_V#, #ATTN_V#, #CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V#)
statements.update: UPDATE RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION SET AXTMODIFY = #AXTMODIFY#,REPORTTITLE_V = #REPORTTITLE_V#,REPORTNAME_V = #REPORTNAME_V#,RESELLERNAME_V = #RESELLERNAME_V#,QUOTATIONNO_V = #QUOTATIONNO_V#,UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V = #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#,QUOTE_DATE_V = #QUOTE_DATE_V#,COMPACT_V = #COMPACT_V#,SHIP_DATE_V = #SHIP_DATE_V#,EMAIL_V = #EMAIL_V#,PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V = #PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V#,PHONE_V = #PHONE_V#,COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V = #COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V#,FAX_V = #FAX_V#,CUSTOMERNAME_V = #CUSTOMERNAME_V#,ADDRESS_V = #ADDRESS_V#,ORDERTYPE_V = #ORDERTYPE_V#,DELIVERYADDRESS_V = #DELIVERYADDRESS_V#,OFFERORS_V = #OFFERORS_V#,ITEM1_V = #ITEM1_V#,PRODUCT_NAME1_V = #PRODUCT_NAME1_V#,SPECIFICATION1_V = Select * From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION

LIMIT #START_V#, #LIMIT_V#

SELECT * FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMSTATUS_ALERT
WORK_EVENT_V like #WORKEVENT_V#
statements.update: UPDATE RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMSTATUS_ALERT SET WORK_EVENT_V = #WORK_EVENT_V#, STATUS_V = #STATUS_V# WHERE SID = #SID#
statements.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION
statements.statement:

dealer_tw_v like #DEALER_TW_V#

dealer_tw_v like #DEALER_TW_V#
